page.title: 03A Day in Sarah Cobbe's life
page.content: set out chairs for assembly.We then go outside and line up.We have three lines one for us,class three ,one for class one and one for class two.Debbie the Caretaker opens the door and we go in.At five minutes past nine we have assembly, where we all sit down and listen to one of the teachers. Then we go back to the class room and have lessons. We usually have English, we all write or copy out of a book, all the girls sit on one table and the boys sit on another table. Then at twenty five minutes past ten we have a morning playtime. We go outside.Round the school we have a playing field and a tarmacced floor with a climbing frame with ropes and bars to climb on. Nearly every day I play with my best friend, Rachael who's ten , a year and a bit older. We play on the bars.Then we go in at twenty minutes
